Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependencyBuilder
    Use AbstractDependency.Builder directly

    This class overrides all public mutators on the the parent class so that the method signatures match their pre-deprecated versions.

    TODO Remove by 2017-01-01
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependencyBuilder
    Use PingableDependency.Builder directly This class overrides all public mutators on the the parent class so that the method signatures match their pre-deprecated versions. TODO Remove by 2017-01-01
    com.indeed.status.core.Urgency.BuiltIns
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.description
    Direct field access deprecated; use getDescription() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.documentationUrl
    Direct field access deprecated; use getDocumentationUrl() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.id
    Direct field access deprecated; use getId() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.pingPeriod
    Direct field access deprecated; use getPingPeriod() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.Urgency.BuiltIns.REQUIRED
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.servicePool
    Direct field access deprecated; use getServicePool() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.Urgency.BuiltIns.STRONG
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.timeout
    Direct field access deprecated; use getTimeout() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency.Builder.toggle
    Direct field access deprecated; use PingableDependency.Builder.getToggle()} instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.type
    Direct field access deprecated; use getType() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.Urgency.BuiltIns.UNKNOWN
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency.Builder.urgency
    Direct field access deprecated; use getUrgency() instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.Urgency.BuiltIns.WEAK
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.indeed.status.core.CheckResultSet.getStartTime()
    Use CheckResultSet.getStartTimeMillis() instead
    com.indeed.status.core.CheckResultSet.summarize(boolean)
    This is replaced by CheckResultSet.summarizeBySystemReporter(boolean) You could call CheckResultSet.CheckResultSet(SystemReporter) to inject your own customized system reporter and CheckResultSet.summarizeBySystemReporter(boolean) would return the customized reports to you.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency)
    Instead, use AbstractDependency.AbstractDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String).
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String)
    Instead, use AbstractDependency.AbstractDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String).
    com.indeed.status.core.AbstractDependencyManager(String, Logger, ThreadPoolExecutor)
    Use AbstractDependencyManager.AbstractDependencyManager(String, Logger, ThreadPoolExecutor, WallClock) instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.CheckResult(Dependency, CheckStatus, String, long, long, long, Throwable)
    Use CheckResult.Builder instead
    com.indeed.status.core.CheckResultSet.DetailedSystemReport()
    Use #DetailedSystemReport(WallClock) instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.CheckResultSet.SystemReport()
    Use #SystemReport(WallClock) instead
    com.indeed.status.core.CheckResultSet()
    Use CheckResultSet.Builder instead TODO Remove after a reasonable grace period.
    com.indeed.status.core.ComparableDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, T, T, T)
    Instead, use ComparableDependency#ComparableDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String, T, T ,T).
    com.indeed.status.core.DependencyPinger(Dependency)
    Use DependencyPinger.DependencyPinger(Dependency, SystemReporter) instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String, Supplier)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String, WallClock, Supplier)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, long, long, Urgency, Supplier)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, long, Urgency)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, long, Urgency, DependencyType, String)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, Urgency)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
    com.indeed.status.core.PingableDependency(String, String, Urgency, DependencyType, String)
    Use a SimplePingableDependency.Builder with a Callable instead.
